goal.tools.unittest.testsection

Interface TestSection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssertTest, DoActionSection, EvaluateIn

    public interface TestSection
    Test sections consist of do statements for performing actions and modules, of assert statements, and of test conditions. Upon successful evaluation a TestSectionResult should be provided. If evaluation fails, a TestSectionFailed may be thrown.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje
    See Also:
    Test
